name: 2D Platformer (jzhan)
description:
This 2D Platformer game is by Kaijia Joanna Zhan for MSU CAS 117. 

Three modifications I will make for the next submission, I will be making the arena bigger so I can add more mobs and more areas that the player must navigate precisely to get to. I will also add in a boss that would have more health than a normal enemy. I will also try to create a different background so that one of the levels have a unique environment.
